entry.title: German National Accused Of $150 Million Crypto Fraud Evades Capture
entry.summary:
Horst Jicha, a German national charged with orchestrating a $150 million crypto fraud scheme, has become a fugitive after failing to appear in a Brooklyn federal court.¬†
Jicha was reportedly under home detention in New York City, having secured a $5 million bond guaranteed by his domestic partner and children.¬†
¬†Trial Set For March 31
According to a report from CNBC, Jicha was expected in court for a pretrial hearing but did not show up, prompting the Brooklyn US attorney‚Äôs office to initiate a search for him, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a very active investigation underway to capture him,‚Äù said John Marzulli, a spokesman for the office.¬†
In addition to seeking to forfeit the bond, prosecutors aim to recover the $4 million portion that was ‚Äúpersonally guaranteed‚Äù by Jicha‚Äôs partner and family membe‚Ä¶

entry.title: Arkham Intelligence Set To Launch New Crypto Derivatives Exchange Next Month
entry.summary:
According to a recent Bloomberg report, blockchain data firm Arkham Intelligence, backed by Sam Altman, the founder of OpenAI, is preparing to launch a crypto derivatives exchange in November.¬†
New Crypto Exchange On The Horizon
According to a source familiar with the plans, Arkham is relocating its operations from London and New York to Punta Cana in the Dominican Republic, aligning with the company‚Äôs ambition to establish a new venue for its exchange operations, which will cater primarily to retail investors. However, the platform will not be accessible to US investors.
Founded in 2020, Arkham has developed a platform that assesses blockchain data to provide insights into the entities and individuals driving activity in the crypto market.¬†

entry.title: Japan‚Äôs Metaplanet Scoops Another 108 Bitcoin, Inches Closer To 1000 BTC Target
entry.summary:
On October 10, 2024, Japanese investment firm Metaplanet added another 108 Bitcoin (BTC) to its reserves, bringing its total holdings to over 748 BTC.
Metaplanet Eyes 1000 Bitcoin Target
In its third purchase of October, Metaplanet acquired an additional 108 BTC at an average price of $61,659. The firm‚Äôs total reserves now stand at 748.502 BTC, valued at over $46.5 million at current market prices.
Earlier this month, the Tokyo-based firm purchased 107 BTC on October 1 for roughly $7 million, followed by another acquisition of 108 BTC on October 7 for $6.7 million. Additionally, on October 3, Metaplanet earned 23.9 BTC by selling put options and collecting premiums.
Metaplanet‚Äôs overall average buying price for BTC is around $62,500, higher than the current market price of $61,35‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
In a recent interview with analysts from the research and brokerage firm Bernstein, MicroStrategy founder Michael Saylor articulated his ambitious vision for the company: to transform it into the leading Bitcoin (BTC) bank.¬†
During the interview, Saylor emphasized BTC‚Äôs importance as a valuable asset, stating that his ultimate goal is to position MicroStrategy at the forefront of Bitcoin financial services.
A Leading Bitcoin Financial Institution
Gautam Chhugani, head of digital assets at Bernstein, shared insights from Saylor‚Äôs discussion, indicating that MicroStrategy‚Äôs core business strategy revolves around creating capital market instruments tied to Bitcoin.¬†

entry.title: Argentina Leads Latin America With $91 Billion Crypto Inflows ‚Äì Details
entry.summary:
With over $90 billion worth in crypto inflows, Argentina has been declared Latin America‚Äôs leading market for cryptocurrency, dethroning Brazil. The growing instability and unpredictability in the economy as well as inflation has forced people of the country to explore the decentralized world of crypto, immediately making them key players in their region. In fact, it is responsible for almost 25% of the total crypto inflows of Latin America, outweighing that of Brazil at 18%, data from Chainalysis shows. It‚Äôs the need for an alternative to banking that drove the nation to adapt digital assets and decentralized banking.
Economic Uncertainty Driving Adoption

entry.title: DACOM Summit: Fastex CLO Vardan Khachatryan on Crypto Compliance
entry.summary: Fastex Chief Legal Officer Vardan Khachatryan joined Rug Radio creator Mlow at DACOM Summit to discuss how the crypto exchange is advancing compliance, and the regulatory challenges that lie ahead for the sector.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 210 - MIDDLE EAST TENSIONS RISE
entry.summary: Crypto drops as Middle East tensions flare. $500m liquidations in drop. BTC ETFs see largest outflows in a month. Fidelity ETH ETF sees 2nd highest outflow ever. SUI hits 6-month highs, bridge goes live on mainnet. Hashdex set to launch XRP ETF. Wormhole leads altcoin gains after Upbit lists. BTC miners hit record low profits in September Crypto hackers stole $750m in Q3. Telegram has been disclosing IPs since 2018.

entry.title: How Arbitrum is Simplifying Web3 for Web2 Adopters
entry.summary: Arbitrum's Head of Korea, John Park, joined Rug Radio creator Pukerainbow at ArbiVerse to talk about the Ethereum layer-2's strategy in Asia, hackathons, and bringing enterprise clients to its ecosystem.

entry.title: Rep. Tom Emmer Is Confident Crypto Laws Are Coming Soon‚ÄîNo Matter Who Wins the Election
entry.summary: Republican Majority Whip Tom Emmer sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano to discuss the state of crypto legislation, Kamala Harris, Fairshake, and more at Messari Mainnet 2024.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 209 - LET UPTOBER BEGIN!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see inflows for 8 straight days. SUI enters top 20, $110m of unlocks today. SOL weekly DEX volume flips ETH. Firedancer sees very fast TPS on Testnet. ETH gas up 500% in 2 weeks. EIGEN opens at $7bn FDV. FTX creditors vote in favour of restructuring plan. Dell to sell another $1.2bn Dell stock. Metaplanet buys another 107 BTC.Grayscale opens decentralised AI fund to investors. Robinhood allows crypto transfer in EU. Pollak to head Coinbase Wallet & join exec team. Gemini to close in Canada. Japan considers lower cap gains tax on crypto. Ohio bill would make it legal to pay taxes in crypto. Trump project opens whitelist to non-US users. CZ pledges to invest in blockchain companies.

entry.title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Talks Progress on Exchange's Global Regulatory Goals
entry.summary: Decrypt Reporters Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano spoke with Binance CEO Richard Teng about the crypto exchange's progress on establishing a global headquarters, improving its relationships with regulators, and expanding its global presence in the wake of founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao's jailing in the U.S.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 207 - WELCOME BACK TO THE BULL!
entry.summary: Kamala signals support for crypto. Top memecoins all soar, add $10bn in value in a week. MOODENG hits $180m, does 11x in a week. SUI & SEI continue to lead L1s for price & TVL growth. Revolut & Robinhood are considering stablecoin. Visa launches new tokenisation platform for banks. PayPal to allow business accounts to hold crypto Hamster kombat's HMSTER disappoints on launch. Biden admin may have forced Silvergate‚Äôs closure. Court rules crypto mining boxes ‚Äòare securities‚Äô.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 206 - MEMES ARE PUMPING!
entry.summary: BTC nears $65k key resistance level. Kamala makes positive comments about crypto. PayPal allows businesses to hold crypto. Visa allows banks to test RWAs & smart contracts. Cuban wants to be head of SEC. Silvergate claims about ‚ÄòChokepoint 2.0‚Äô grow. Truflation hacked for $5m. Telegram Wallet blocked in UK & US. Court rules crypto mining boxes are securities. Infinex DeFi platform raises $65m. Ethena announces new stablecoin linked to BUIDL.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 205 - ALTCOINS CONTINUE TO RALLY!
entry.summary: SUI leads L1 gains as TVL crosses $1bn. Altcoin market cap close to breaking downtrend. SEI becomes top chain for 1 month TVL growth. ETH ETFs sees 3rd largest inflow ever. SEC delays ETH ETF options decision. SOL took most of ETH outflows over last 3 months. SOLETH continues to be trading at resistance. $8.1bn BTC options to expire this week. BTC heading to $500k-$1m in a year: PlanB. Stablecoin supply hits new ATH. Caroline Ellison sentenced to 2 years in jail. SBF & Diddy in the same jail. SEC settles against TUSD for not being collateralised. Gensler gets derided for crypto approach. Hester Pierce admits flaws in SEC crypto policy. Harris against regulation by litigation: Cuban. Golem claims ETH move to CEXs due to staking. Binance refutes data leak claims. Next Y combinator batch has ‚Äòno crypto companies‚Äô. Celo overtakes Tron for stablecoin addresses.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 204 - MOODENG MOO-NING!
entry.summary: BTC needs to top $65.2k to put in a higher high. ETH ETFs see biggest outflow since July. ETH outperformance could be start of ‚Äòalt season‚Äô. BlackRock gets 12hr BTC withdrawal from Coinbase. cbBTC only wrapped BTC to not show reserves. Telegram to share user data upon legal requests. EIGEN non-transferability to be removed Sep 30th. TIA announces $100m funding round. TIA deal was OTC token sale ‚Äòdone months ago‚Äô. Polymarket considers token, trying $50m raise. Maybe we will pay off debt with crypto: Trump. Harris unlikely to give full crypto policy pre-election. 13m Binance users‚Äô data may have been leaked. Caroline Ellison likely won‚Äôt serve time in jail.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 203 - KAMALA GOES PRO-CRYPTO
entry.summary: Crypto funds saw $321m inflows last week. Kamala commits to crypto & AI expansion. TAO leads gains in AI hype, does 2x in 2 weeks. SUI TVL breaks $900m. Average Q4 returns for BTC is 88%. BTC Google searches down 75% since 2021. BTC 161 days from halving, when it rallied in 2020. Crypto VCs raised $2.2bn this year, well below 2021.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 202 - SOL STARTS TO SEND IT
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Breakpoint begins. SOL launches Frankendancer on mainnet. Helio Pay allows Shopify items to sell on X. Franklin Templeton to launch fund on SOL. BTC short term holders fall at fastest rate in 12 years. MicroStrategy upsizes convertible note raise to $1bn. BingX loses $52m in hack. $243m crypto heist exposed by ZachXBT. Supreme Court of India hacked on X, shills scam. SocGen launches Euro stablecoin on SOL. Sky agrees to stop using WBTC. Germany shuts down 47 crypto exchanges. Stablecoin‚Äôs now 18th biggest holder of treasuries. Consensys lawsuit against SEC dismissed. Partisanship will stop Trump crypto plans: Hoskinson. Scaramucci working with Kamala on crypto.
